free.jin
Interface PGNJinConnection

All Superinterfaces:
JinConnection
public interface PGNJinConnection
extends JinConnection

A tagging interface indicating that the implementing JinConnection generates ChessMoves which include a SAN representation of the move and Positions which include a FEN representation of the position, if the variant is an instance of ChesslikeGenericVariant. With time, the interface may gain more methods/conditions related to implementing PGN.

Field Summary
 
Fields inherited from interface free.jin.JinConnection
ABORTED, ADJOURNED, DRAWN, WHITE_LOST, WHITE_WON
